Diplomatic or trade negotiations (D, E, F) are less effective under current tensions, while cutting diplomatic ties (L) or imposing trade restrictions (M) could further escalate the situation. Direct military actions (P, Q, R, S) are the least reasonable given the potential for catastrophic consequences.
